metadata.title: RZ/G2L: PCB design in respect to DRAM

sections.content:
Question:
Is there a guide about designing the PCB between the RZ/G2L and DRAM?
Answer:
A design guide and verification guide are available. Refer to the following for details. 
PCB design guideline for DDR4/DDR3L
https://www.renesas.com/jp/en/document/gde/rzg2l-rzg2lc-rzv2l-pcb-design-guideline-ddr4ddr3l?language=en&r=1467981
PCB Verification Guide for DDR memory
https://www.renesas.com/document/gde/rzg2l-pcb-verification-guide-ddr4ddr3l-0?language=en&r=1467981
For customers who do not wish to design their own board, mass-production ready partner boards are also available. Please see the following page. 
https://www.renesas.com/products/microcontrollers-microprocessors/rz-mpus/rz-partner-solutions#quick-link-2846
Suitable Products
RZ/G2L
